settings.name: accessibility
settings.description: How much the game expects you to do checks and get items.

values.name: locations
values.description: You can go everywhere, and so, all checks are eventually accessible.

values.name: items
values.description: All progression items are accessible, but all locations won't be guaranteed.

values.name: minimal
values.description: The only guarantee is that you'll have the bare necessity to beat the game.

settings.name: progression_balancing
settings.description: The higher this number is, the less likely you are to end up in BK mode for too long.
